tag_list: bathroom-remodeling, bathroom-remodeling-columbus-ohio, bathroom-remodeling-company, bathroom-remodeling-ohio, bathroom-ideas, dream-baths
overview:
Dream Baths is a full service residential bathroom design, build and remodel firm located in the Historical German Village area of downtown Columbus, Ohio. Our certified designers make your dreams come true with state of the art design technology.

We can show clients what their design project will look like with 3D visualization in full color. Clients can visualize their bathroom design with dark cherry cabinetry and granite countertops or white painted cabinetry with marble countertops. Unsure between a white ceramic tile or creamy tumbled marble tile for the flooring? With a few clicks the bath design changes are made.

Dream Baths will come to your home to measure and design your dream bathroom. After the design has been finalized we will help with the selection of bath cabinets, countertops, tile, lighting, plumbing fixtures and hardware. Our production team will then make sure your bath design and remodel become a reality. We manage the remodeling with the utmost attention and work closely with the homeowner. Call us for FREE Consultation!
